CheckUpdateMore.message: Check for app update on Chrome Web Store and install it.

notificationUpdateDetail.message: An update to version $1 is available. Reloading the app in few seconds.

notificationNoUpdateDetail.message: There aren't any updates at this time.

notificationWaitUpdateDetail.message: I am checking for update right now, wait a while.

notificationUpdatedDetail.message: FimFiction Reader has been updated to version $1.

offlineDetail.message:
Seems like your internet connection is down.
The offline mode for this App is still not complete, so you see this message.

ReloadAppMore.message: Reload's App from disk (and installs updates if there are any)

ConfirmResetData.message:
Do you really want to clear browser data?
This will remove cookies and cached pages, meaning you will be logged out.

clear_data.message: All cookies and cached pages removed!

ConfirmNewUrlChange.message: There was change in last visited URL. Change current URL to:

block_window.message: Window popup blocked! Tried to open:

block_exception.message: To open this link in Chrome, hold Shift and click again.

MaximizeMore.message:
Maximize app
If holding "Shift" then fullscreen app
(To exit fullscreen press "Esc")

GoToURLMore.message: Go to some URL, if you want

saveLastPage.message: Go to last visited page on app start

enableShiftToOpenWindow.message: Enable holding Shift to open link in Chrome

shortcuts_help.message:
Shortcuts
Ctrl + P - Toggle settings
Ctrl + R - Browser Reload
Ctrl + Left Arrow - Browser Back
Ctrl + Right Arrow - Browser Forward
Ctrl + Up Arrow - Browser Scroll Top
Ctrl + Down Arrow - Browser Reload
Ctrl + F - Focus site search
Ctrl + G - Go to url
Ctrl + Alt + F - Toggle App Fullscreen
Esc - Exit fullscreen
